channel.title: Installing Whonix on Synology NAS Virtual Machine Manager
channel.description:
Hi,
Just wondering if it's possible to install Whonix on a Synology NAS which can run virtual machine via Virtual Machine Manager?
I've downloaded the ova file and imported it via the "create VM" button, then started the VM and see an error flash past, then the screen shows a black screen with a flashing cursor.
[FAILED] Failed to start Raise network interfaces.
The VM has been assigned the e1000 network interface card type.
8GB of memory has been assigned.
Anyone know if it's possible and how to resolve the above error?
Cheers!

item.title: Installing Whonix on Synology NAS Virtual Machine Manager
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Maybe

Whonix – 20 May 22

Whonix ™ for KVM

Using Whonix ™ with KVM (Kernel Virtual Machine)

? It uses Virtual Machine Manager.

Read full topic
item.source: Installing Whonix on Synology NAS Virtual Machine Manager
